name: @erickwendel/alumnus-wrapper
description: N|Sentinel alumnus - Demo observability application for testing OpenTelemetry integration with Prometheus, Grafana, Loki and Tempo

scripts.test:docker: cd apps/alumnus && docker compose -f infra/docker-compose-test.yaml up --build --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from alumnus-test
scripts.test:docker:down: cd apps/alumnus && docker compose -f infra/docker-compose-test.yaml down --volumes
scripts.docker:infra:cleanup: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose-infra.yaml down --volumes --remove-orphans && rm -rf infra/storage

author: ErickWendel
